thread.title: How Valley Fire’s ‘wall of flame’ trapped, injured 4 in crew
thread.title_full: How Valley Fire’s ‘wall of flame’ trapped, injured 4 in crew - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Kale Williams
title: How Valley Fire’s ‘wall of flame’ trapped, injured 4 in crew
text:
Photo: Josh Edelson, AFP / Getty Images A house is engulfed in flames during the Valley Fire in Seigler Springs, California on September 13, 2015. A house is engulfed in flames during the Valley Fire in Seigler...
In the early hours of the Valley Fire, four firefighters found themselves surrounded by spot fires on top of Cobb Mountain and were forced to deploy fire shelters as crews in the air and on the ground struggled to get aid to the trapped men, all of whom were badly burned. A house is engulfed in flames during the Valley Fire in Seigler Springs, California on September 13, 2015. A house is engulfed in flames during the Valley Fire in Seigler...
In the early hours of the Valley Fire, four firefighters found themselves surrounded by spot fires on top of Cobb Mountain and were forced to deploy fire shelters as crews in the air and on the ground struggled to get aid to the trapped men, all of whom were badly burned.
